mapper.insert: insert into ecs_ecsmart_article_cat (cat_id, cat_name, cat_type, keywords, cat_desc, sort_order, show_in_nav, parent_id) values (#{catId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{catName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{showInNav,jdbcType=BIT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=SMALLINT})

mapper.select: select cat_id, cat_name, cat_type, keywords, cat_desc, sort_order, show_in_nav, parent_id from ecs_ecsmart_article_cat
